name: Twelve Nights (Demo)
description:
-ABOUT THE GAME-

This game is all about surviving the zombie apocalypse. Your job is to kill as many zombies as possible and in each night you have to survive. If you happen to lose or die once, then all of your save files will reset from the current Night to the beginning. All you can do is survive. No one will help you but yourself. Hope you can reach night 12.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-DEMO VERSION-

In this version the only mode available is Endless mode. In Endless mode you can only buy at least 4 weapons such as Pistol, Assault Rifle, Shotgun, and Rocket Launcher, Kill count, keeps count with the number of zombies you have killed, Level count, keeps tab of the levels, and about 5 zombies each with their own unique Stats.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-Full Game Features-

Here are the list for the full release game:

12 days survival, each with there own different modes
Such as:
-Kill them all
-Supplies
-Etc.

-Bigger Map
-Day/night cycle
-More Zombies
-More Weapons
-Weapon craft
-Difficulty mode
-Updates, Improvements, and new future contents
